name: Log errors (30m)
description: This PromQL query measures the number of generated error messages in logs over the last 30 minutes. A non-zero value may indicate potential connectivity or misconfiguration errors.
question: How many error messages were generated in the logs in the last 30 minutes?

description: This PromQL query measures the number of generated error messages in logs over the last 30 minutes. A non-zero value may indicate potential connectivity or misconfiguration errors.

name: Uptime
description: The PromQL query measures the uptime of a system or service by querying metrics related to its availability over a specific time range.
question: What is the average CPU uptime over the past 5 minutes?
